mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, nickname, avatar, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, avatar = #{avatar}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
